GSD.description:
mmc: host: Return an error when ->enable_sdio_irq() ops is missing

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 95d65bca6eb9967aa5f6ed7a32e041b4f11ffbc2. For more details please see the references link.
